verses.verse: Thus <S%H3541><s%> saith <S%H559><s%> the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> Where <S%H335><s%> is the bill <S%H5612><s%> of your mother's <S%H517><s%> divorcement, <S%H3748><s%> whom <S%H834><s%> I have put away? <S%H7971><s%> or <S%H176><s%> which <S%H4310><s%> of my creditors <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5383><s%> is it to whom <S%H834><s%> I have sold <S%H4376><s%> you? Behold, <S%H2005><s%> for your iniquities <S%H5771><s%> have ye sold yourselves, <S%H4376><s%> and for your transgressions <S%H6588><s%> is your mother <S%H517><s%> put away. <S%H7971><s%>

Wherefore, <S%H4069><s%> when I came, <S%H935><s%> was there no <S%H369><s%> man? <S%H376><s%> when I called, <S%H7121><s%> was there none <S%H369><s%> to answer? <S%H6030><s%> Is my hand <S%H3027><s%> shortened at all, <S%H7114><s%> <S%H7114><s%> that it cannot redeem? <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6304><s%> or <S%H518><s%> have I no <S%H369><s%> power <S%H3581><s%> to deliver? <S%H5337><s%> behold, <S%H2005><s%> at my rebuke <S%H1606><s%> I dry up <S%H2717><s%> the sea, <S%H3220><s%> I make <S%H7760><s%> the rivers <S%H5104><s%> a wilderness: <S%H4057><s%> their fish <S%H1710><s%> stinketh, <S%H887><s%> because there is no <S%H4480><s%> <S%H369><s%> water, <S%H4325><s%> and dieth <S%H4191><s%> for thirst. <S%H6772><s%>
I clothe <S%H3847><s%> the heavens <S%H8064><s%> with blackness, <S%H6940><s%> and I make <S%H7760><s%> sackcloth <S%H8242><s%> their covering. <S%H3682><s%>

The Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD <S%H3069><s%> hath given <S%H5414><s%> me the tongue <S%H3956><s%> of the learned, <S%H3928><s%> that I should know <S%H3045><s%> how to speak a word in season <S%H5790><s%> <S%H1697><s%> to <S%H853><s%> him that is weary: <S%H3287><s%> he wakeneth <S%H5782><s%> morning <S%H1242><s%> by morning, <S%H1242><s%> he wakeneth <S%H5782><s%> mine ear <S%H241><s%> to hear <S%H8085><s%> as the learned. <S%H3928><s%>

The Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD <S%H3069><s%> hath opened <S%H6605><s%> mine ear, <S%H241><s%> and I <S%H595><s%> was not <S%H3808><s%> rebellious, <S%H4784><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> turned away <S%H5472><s%> back. <S%H268><s%>

I gave <S%H5414><s%> my back <S%H1460><s%> to the smiters, <S%H5221><s%> and my cheeks <S%H3895><s%> to them that plucked off the hair: <S%H4803><s%> I hid <S%H5641><s%> not <S%H3808><s%> my face <S%H6440><s%> from shame <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3639><s%> and spitting. <S%H7536><s%>

For the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD <S%H3069><s%> will help <S%H5826><s%> me; therefore <S%H5921><s%> <S%H3651><s%> shall I not <S%H3808><s%> be confounded: <S%H3637><s%> therefore <S%H5921><s%> <S%H3651><s%> have I set <S%H7760><s%> my face <S%H6440><s%> like a flint, <S%H2496><s%> and I know <S%H3045><s%> that <S%H3588><s%> I shall not <S%H3808><s%> be ashamed. <S%H954><s%>

He is near <S%H7138><s%> that justifieth <S%H6663><s%> me; who <S%H4310><s%> will contend <S%H7378><s%> with <S%H854><s%> me? let us stand <S%H5975><s%> together: <S%H3162><s%> who <S%H4310><s%> is mine adversary? <S%H1167><s%> <S%H4941><s%> let him come near <S%H5066><s%> to <S%H413><s%> me.

Behold, <S%H2005><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD <S%H3069><s%> will help <S%H5826><s%> me; who <S%H4310><s%> is he <S%H1931><s%> that shall condemn <S%H7561><s%> me? lo, <S%H2005><s%> they all <S%H3605><s%> shall wax old <S%H1086><s%> as a garment; <S%H899><s%> the moth <S%H6211><s%> shall eat them up. <S%H398><s%>

Who <S%H4310><s%> is among you that feareth <S%H3373><s%> the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> that obeyeth <S%H8085><s%> the voice <S%H6963><s%> of his servant, <S%H5650><s%> that <S%H834><s%> walketh <S%H1980><s%> in darkness, <S%H2825><s%> and hath no <S%H369><s%> light? <S%H5051><s%> let him trust <S%H982><s%> in the name <S%H8034><s%> of the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> and stay <S%H8172><s%> upon his God. <S%H430><s%>

Behold, <S%H2005><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> ye that kindle <S%H6919><s%> a fire, <S%H784><s%> that compass yourselves about <S%H247><s%> with sparks: <S%H2131><s%> walk <S%H1980><s%> in the light <S%H217><s%> of your fire, <S%H784><s%> and in the sparks <S%H2131><s%> that ye have kindled. <S%H1197><s%> This <S%H2063><s%> shall ye have <S%H1961><s%> of mine hand; <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3027><s%> ye shall lie down <S%H7901><s%> in sorrow. <S%H4620><s%>
